alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lonoke, east central Saline and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Geyer Springs, or over Southwest Little Rock, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Downtown Little Rock... Lonoke... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Keo... Otter Creek... Ironton... Estes... Meto... Toltec Mounds State Park... Protho Junction... Sweet Home... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... State Fairgrounds... Scott... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Arkansas.
